select count(paper_no) from stuff_info where (paper_no like '%${findStr}%' or title like '%${findStr}%' or date_write like '%${findStr}%') and state = ${state}

SELECT paper_no,title,date_write FROM draft_info WHERE (gm = ${empNo} AND dm IS null AND state = 1) OR (dm = ${empNo} AND ceo IS null AND state = 1) OR (ceo = ${empNo} AND state = 1) UNION SELECT paper_no,title,date_write FROM stuff_info WHERE (gm = ${empNo} AND dm IS null AND state = 1) OR (dm = ${empNo} AND ceo IS null AND state = 1) OR (ceo = ${empNo} AND state = 1) UNION SELECT paper_no,title,date_write FROM attendance_info WHERE (gm = ${empNo} AND dm IS null AND state = 1) OR (dm = ${empNo} AND ceo IS null AND state = 1) OR (ceo = ${empNo} AND state = 1) order by paper_no desc
